A1: Zimbabwe had imposed sanctions upon itself
RelatedSentence: Only this week the French Ambassador , Laurent Delahousse , said Zimbabwe had imposed sanctions upon itself through corruption , violation of people 's rights and other unacceptable behaviour and should stop blaming other countries .

·         The Zimbabwe Action Forum met after the Vigil to discuss the progress of its diaspora initiative to promote change at home .
